name: Little Tim
description:
Hello! We are a small dev team and this is our first game for our first Game Jam, we hope you all enjoy playing it!!! This game was made in 3 days and it's not fully polished. The theme of the Jam was FAILURE IS PROGRESS. We tried to do something different by doing a very short puzzle game based on the "life" of a tin can. There are 3 different endings!! Have fun!!

-PRESS R TO RESTART

-IF YOU GET STUCK FLOATING IN THE SECOND LEVEL, RESTART!

-DOWNLOAD THE UPDATED VERSION IF YOU'RE HAVING TROUBLE WITH THE  TIME!
